about_the_game:
Frontier Pilot Simulator : Soundtrack OST
By the request of our community, we released a full soundtrack list from the game. OST contains all the music from the game.

It contains _ tracks:
"Into the Verse (Main menu)"
"New frontiers (Free flight theme)",
"Good ol' Garage (Hangar theme)",
"Bleed air (Free flight theme)",
"Danger Alert (Extreme flying conditions)",
"We are home (Base theme)",
"Ground control (Base theme)".

Enjoy relaxing sci-fi tracks.
TOTAL TIME 26 minutes.
